com.smarthome.simulator.modules

Class SHC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smarthome.simulator.modules.Module
      • com.smarthome.simulator.modules.SHC

  • public class SHC
extends Module
    The SHC class represents the Smart Home Core Functionality module.
